attributes.action: Ban the march proposed by Anjem Choudary of Islam4UK through Wootton Bassett
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want the Prime Minister to ban  march proposed by Anjem Choudary of Islam4UK through the streets of Wootton Bassett, on the grounds that it will only serve to offend the residents and the wider population of all creeds.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
